SCTX - Script Source:
ScriptName mwSeydaNeenHriskarFlatFootScript

ref NPC

begin Gamemode

	Set NPC to GetSelf 
;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	if GetIsCurrentPackage mwSeydaNeenHriskarFlatFootSpyingTown00x6 == 1 
		if NPC.GetItemCount EnchRingChameleonGold == 0
			NPC.AddItem EnchRingChameleonGold 1
		endif
		NPC.EquipItem EnchRingChameleonGold 1
	endif
	if GetIsCurrentPackage mwSeydaNeenHriskarFlatFootSpyingTown00x6 == 0 
		NPC.UnequipItem EnchRingChameleonGold 9999
		NPC.RemoveItem EnchRingChameleonGold 9999
	endif
;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
End
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 0 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
